channel.title: Moparscape
channel.description:
Does any one of you notice that this community is basically made out of 5 different groups of members?
1) Clueless newbies who only repeat topics in the Server Help board 2) Considerably same people who post in the General Category 3) Members who are involved only with the Client category 4) The RSC people 5) Those who post almost anywhere
Why is this happening?
I'd have to agree with someone from Rune[i]-[/i]Server who once mentioned that Moparscape's Server Help board is always filled with retarded questions. The same people post in the General Category and a majority stops bothering helping those asking help. The third and fourth groups, they're like their own community.
Opinions?

item.title: Moparscape
item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

[quote=“justinxg27, post:66, topic:355973”][quote author=`Aaron link=topic=452513.msg3323385#msg3323385 date=1282895722]

[quote author=justinxg27 link=topic=452513.msg3323376#msg3323376 date=1282893692]

[quote author=`Aaron link=topic=452513.msg3323359#msg3323359 date=1282891649]

It’s a Forum MoparScape, there’s nothing really to explain lol

[/quote]I think the original post was more accurate.

Agreed.

Justinxg27, are you trying to get people on this forum to make fun of you? more than we already do?
[/quote]I don’t give a flying fuck if I’m made fun of over the net. The real life is all I care about.

@David the tool,

There have been a fucking shitload of topics about how we are, etc… and guess what?
Nothing’s changed.

That’s why I don’t bother on this forum much anymore. So how about, stop fucking complaining and face the fact that MoparScape has turned into a terrible forum. By making topics about how bad the forum’s state is, yet knowing that nothing’s going to change is just stupid. As I speak, there is probably a 10 or so year old child registering to join this forum.

Tl;Dr,

Who cares? if you are worried about 10 year old children registering at this forum, you shouldn’t have registered. If you don’t bother with this forum, just leave.

You came here in 2009, you don’t know what the fuck Moparscape has turned into.
[/quote]I don’t need to be here any earlier to know. I’ve read the stupid topics you guys have crying about how it’s changed, that’s enough.
Now Grow the fuck up.

That is all, bye.[/quote]

Don’t Worry I Will Grow The Fuck Up

On a more serious note, instead of being an idiot, why not just leave without notice? it’s not like anyone on this website will miss you.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote="`Aaron, post:54, topic:355973"][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=452513.msg3318817#msg3318817 date=1282523500]

Had a discussion with some people a while ago about this. The fact is that we need to clean the download section and create a die-out of Delta servers (from this site). Not only that, I think you need to put a big “DO NOT COME HERE UNLESS YOU KNOW WHAT JAVA IS, GOOGLED IT, AND LEARNED THE BASICS OF THE PROGRAMMING LANGUAGE” (caps lawks) or along those lines. Simply put, it would clean the help section if they just know basics of JAVA. We wouldn’t have so much server help if we just let bad sources, bad programming habits, and people who know nothing (yet) about JAVA come here.

It’s funny though, because you don’t know anything about Java.

And you know this how?
[/quote]

Because you wouldn’t be bitching about the basics.[/quote]

Basics = essential to know before attempting to program a server. I’m bitching about people knowing them first.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape
item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

[quote=“Rixxx, post:38, topic:355973”]@reyx7 and Davidi2: Why are you even disussing groups? -.-

Honestly every community has some retarded members and staff. Just got to look at which ones do their jobs right.

Staff wins on Moparscape, members win on Rune server.

Rune-Server’s staff system is so retarded; demoted ones get back their positions in a week. Basically on that community, the staff changes every week. The members there are better here in the sense of programming but all of them act like they’re the best.

@fellixombc: Where is your logic in saying “ignore its faults… flamers/trolls”? That’s basically letting the flamers and trolls do as they please. Might as well punish them.[/quote]
No, I’m saying don’t blame all your problems on the flamers/trolls. Sure, they disrupt the community, but who cares? They’re not the reason why this community sucks.

Read full topic
